projectName.headline: Sony+IITP Recommendation Model
projectName.description: Efficacy of LLM in Predicting Hindi Movies' Attributes: A Comprehensive Survey and Content-Based Analysis

projectName.headline: NITAP TnP Cell Website with LLM
projectName.description: Developed Full Stack website utilizing LLM for automated Resume building, placements notification and guidance for Institute, on NEXT-JS Framework on Firebase Database.

projectName.headline: NLU-Driven Real-Time HR Data Query System
projectName.description: Seamless natural language querying of real-time HR data on an Oracle Server, using Gemini API, integrated the system on web interface.

projectName.headline: Multimodal Conversational AI with Emotional Intelligence
projectName.description: 'Visual FusionBot': Integrating computer vision, NLP, and Generative AI for human-like therapeutic conversations(23icbai642). Authored and presented conference paper at 10th International Conference on Business Analytics and Intelligence, 2023.

projectName.headline: Predictive Caption Generation with CNN-LSTM Neural Network
projectName.description: Utilized VGG16 as a Computer Vision model for feature extraction from images, integrating it with an LSTM network for generating captions. Achieved BLEU-1 Score: 0.527 and BLEU-2 Score: 0.301.

projectName.headline: NITAP Finance Department Website
projectName.description: Developed Full Stack large scale Finance Department website from scratch for security with backend on Django Framework SQLite Database.

projectName.headline: VLSI Design Engineering
projectName.description: Designed novel 16-bit Hexadecimal IC Lock System on Industry suite Cadence.

projectName.headline: Automated Verilog Code Generation
projectName.description: Python-based Automation for Verilog Code Generation from VHDL.

projectName.headline: Stock Performance Analysis and Forecasting
projectName.description: Developed Web-Scraping module and ML models on Time Series, compared performances and derived insights.
